Class QuestionListManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.app.ESmanager.QuestionListManager

  • public class QuestionListManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This manager manages all operations on questions and question IDs.

    Bicheng

      • searchQuestions

        public QuestionList searchQuestions(java.lang.String searchString,
                           java.lang.String field,
                           long from,
                           long size)
        Get questions with the specified search string. If the search does not specify fields, it searches on all the fields.
        Parameters:
        searchString - The keyword for searching questions.
        field - the specified searching field
        size - The size of the string buffer for searching.
        from - The starting position of searching.
        lable - The label of the string buffer.
        Returns:
        the searching result.
